wikipedia_page.main: George Affleck (born 1888 in Auchendinny, Scotland) was a footballer who played in the Football League for Grimsby Town and Leeds City. Following his retirement, he became a football coach in Rotterdam.

response: *George Affleck (1888–?), Scottish footballer for Grimsby Town and Leeds City
